active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the trade-offs between aggressive remediation timelines in a POA&M versus risk acceptance for legacy systems. How does this impact FISMA reporting and Authorization to Operate (ATO)? Support your position with references to NIST SP 800-53 and real-world examples.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
